question: Which of the following is the main purpose of Yuva Udyamita Vikas Abhiyan of Uttar Pradesh?
option4: Providing jobs to unemployed youth under MGNREGS
explanation: The main purpose of Yuva Udyamita Vikas Abhiyan or YUVA Hub Yojana 2020 of Uttar Pradesh is to make youths self-dependent by providing them various training programmes under UP Skill Development Mission.
